solution_line_template: The students bought ${student_ticket_cost}*{num_students}=${<<{student_ticket_cost}*{num_students}={student_ticket_total}>>{student_ticket_total}} worth of tickets
The adults bought ${adult_ticket_cost}*{num_adults}=${<<{adult_ticket_cost}*{num_adults}={adult_ticket_total}>>{adult_ticket_total}} worth of tickets
Together ${student_ticket_total} + ${adult_ticket_total} = ${<<{student_ticket_total}+{adult_ticket_total}={total_tickets_sold}>>{total_tickets_sold}} worth of tickets were sold
